definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果不塗油或保持清潔鐵便會腐蝕。

sentences.english: He had to repair the wagon, grease the axles .
sentences.chinese: 他得去修理大車，給車軸塗油。

sentences.english: And then you have issues such as birds and mammals coated with oil, " he said."
sentences.chinese: 然後你如鳥類和哺乳動物塗油的問題，“他說。

sentences.english: Oil the pudding tray, put the mixture into it, steam for 1hr.
sentences.chinese: 倒入已塗油之糕盆內，隔水蒸約1小時。

sentences.english: I thought it tasted better than baked pizza although it was oilier .
sentences.chinese: 我認爲它味道比烤比薩雖然它塗油機。

sentences.english: That can be applied to the improvement in the future of the oiler and offered certain basis.
sentences.chinese: 爲靜電塗油機今後的改進提供了一定的依據。

sentences.english: And just what has been done by the oiling and smoothing?
sentences.chinese: 但是在車輪上塗油和把路修平有什麼作用呢？

sentences.english: Also, thicker and oilier skin areas tend to exhibit less wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 此外，加厚和塗油機領域，容易出現皮膚皺紋少。

sentences.english: The application of QFD and the electrostatic oiler were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 對QFD技術及靜電塗油機進行了簡單介紹。

sentences.english: Rub with minced garlic and place in shallow baking dish. Lightly coat with oil, vinegar and salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 用切碎的大蒜擦勻牛肉再輕輕塗油，醋和鹽，胡椒。

sentences.english: None smear oil on pin here.
sentences.chinese: 我們這兒沒見過塗油的。
